item.desc: Worked out my timesheet for the 43rd week of 2009 and published the global timesheet on the website.

Published the first revision of the SPMP document. A DOAP metadata file was added for describing this document. In addition a separaye URFM file was added to describe different the current and future releases of this document.
Published the 2009/10/23 meeting minutes on the website. In addition, performed cleanups on the repository and third-party installations.
